column4: detailed analysis on the compensation toolkit
column6: further explore the relationship between corporate culture and compensation scheme
column7: boarder advice on CEO compensation design

column8: In section 4, the advices are interesting, but they might be a bit too general. It would be fbetter to write a section about how to apply these advices on GE.
A very good analytical writing. The analysis on different compensation tools are quite comprehensive and show a very good understanding on compensation design.
